metaIntro.value: Row and Column are the basic structural element for building an initial content structure by adding rows and dividing them into columns. You can insert other content elements into columns.

metaDescription.value: Row and Column are the basic structural element for building an initial content structure by adding rows and dividing them into columns. You can insert other content elements into columns.

metaPreviewDescription.value: Row and Column are the basic structural element for building an initial content structure by adding rows and dividing them into columns. You can insert other content elements into columns.

options.label: Extra class name
options.description: Add an extra class name to the element and refer to it from Custom CSS option.
